item.title: Anthropic的人工智能推进引发分析师对IT服务收入的担忧
item.description: 分析师警告称，人工智能的快速发展——部分源于Anthropic公司最新的自动化推动——可能从结构上侵蚀IT行业高利润的应用服务收入，从而给盈利和估值带来下行风险。【原文：Rapid advances in artificial intelligence, triggered in part by Anthropic's latest automation push, could structurally erode the IT sector's high-margin application services revenues, creating downside risks to earnings and valuations, analysts warn.】

item.title: 台湾富士康预测第一季度业绩强劲
item.description: 台湾富士康周四表示，对第一季度业绩抱有强烈预期，此前该公司报告1月份营收同比增长35.5%。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn on Thursday flagged strong expectations for its first quarter performance, after reporting a 35.5% year-on-year rise in January revenue.】

item.title: 台湾晶圆厂ASE预计其先进封装业务将在2026年实现翻番，达到32亿美元规模。
item.description: 全球最大的芯片封装和测试服务商亚德诺科技控股公司周四表示，预计其尖端先进封装业务规模将在2026年翻番，达到32亿美元。【原文：ASE Technology Holding , the world's largest chip packaging and testing provider, on Thursday said it expects its leading-edge advanced packaging business to double in size to $3.2 billion in 2026.】

item.title: 为取悦特朗普，中国面临增购美国大豆价格上涨的压力
item.description: 中国大豆进口商若增购800万吨美国大豆，将面临大幅增加的成本。此前美国总统特朗普曾表示北京方面正在考虑增购。与此同时，竞争对手巴西正值出口旺季，其大豆供应价格远低于美国。【原文：Chinese soybean importers face much higher costs to bring in an additional 8 million metric tons of U.S. cargoes, whose purchase President Donald Trump has said Beijing is weighing, as rival Brazilian supplies are far cheaper in their peak export season.】

item.title: 美国无人机制造商寻求亚洲市场，因中国威胁加剧
item.description: 本周，多家美国无人机公司首次亮相新加坡航展，试图将业务范围从五角大楼拓展至亚洲国家——这些国家日益担忧中国军事扩张带来的威胁。【原文：Several U.S. drone firms made their debuts at the Singapore Airshow this week, seeking to expand their business beyond the Pentagon to countries in Asia that are increasingly concerned about the threat posed by China's military build-up.】

item.title: 马士基预计运价下跌将拖累2026年利润
item.description: 丹麦航运巨头马士基周四公布的第四季度营业利润基本符合预期，但警告称，持续的行业挑战叠加运价下跌将拖累2026年的盈利表现。【原文：Danish shipping giant Maersk on Thursday reported fourth-quarter operating profit broadly in line with expectations and warned that falling freight rates, compounded by ongoing industry challenges, would weigh on earnings in 2026.】

item.title: 英国电信表示有望实现全年业绩预期
item.description: 英国最大的宽带运营商英国电信（BT）——同时拥有EE移动网络——公布季度营收下滑4%，符合市场预期，并表示公司正按计划实现年度目标。【原文：BT , Britain's biggest broadband operator which also owns the EE mobile network, posted a 4% fall in quarterly revenue, in line with forecasts, and said it was on track to meet its targets for the year.】

item.title: 法国部长：2026年将成为抵制Shein之年
item.description: 法国中小企业部长塞尔日·帕潘周四表示，2026年将成为抵制Shein等在线平台之年，他指责这些平台对所售商品不承担责任。【原文：Serge Papin, the French Minister for small and medium sized businesses, said on Thursday that 2026 will be the year of resistance against Shein and other on-line platforms which he accused of not being accountable for the products they sell.】

item.title: 壳牌季度利润下滑11%至33亿美元，低于预期
item.description: 壳牌公司周四表示，受油价走低影响，其第四季度净利润为33亿美元，低于市场预期，同比下降11%。该公司同时宣布，未来三个月的股票回购计划将维持在35亿美元不变。【原文：Shell's SHEL.L fourth-quarter net profit of $3.3 billion missed expectations, dropping 11% from a year earlier amid lower oil prices, it said on Thursday as it kept its share buyback programme steady at $3.5 billion for the next three months.】

item.title: 日本钢铁公司将全年净亏损预期扩大至700亿日元
item.description: 日本钢铁公司周四将截至3月的年度净亏损预期上调至700亿日元（约合4.4612亿美元），此前该公司截至12月的九个月业绩已出现亏损。【原文：Nippon Steel on Thursday widened its net loss forecast for the year through March to 70 billion yen ($446.12 million), after ending the nine months to December in the red.】

item.title: 比特币暴跌，7万美元关键关口岌岌可危
item.description: 比特币周四濒临跌破关键的7万美元关口，全球最大加密货币的跌势未见止息迹象。【原文：Bitcoin was on the cusp of breaking below the key $70,000 level on Thursday as a slide in the world's largest cryptocurrency showed no signs of stopping.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车第四季度利润在艰难市场环境中大幅下滑
item.description: 瑞典沃尔沃汽车公司周四报告称，第四季度剔除影响可比性的特殊项目后，其营业利润出现下滑。该公司表示其转型计划进展顺利，但外部环境充满挑战。【原文：Sweden-based Volvo Cars reported a fall in fourth-quarter operating profit excluding items affecting comparability on Thursday and said its turnaround plan was on track, but the external environment challenging.】

item.title: "软件末日"引发投资者抄底，但仍持谨慎态度
item.description: 华尔街的"软件末日"正呈滚雪球之势。如今投资者们争论着，是否该对这些遭重创的股票重燃兴趣。【原文：Wall Street's "Software-mageddon" has been snowballing. Now investors are debating whether it is time to warm up to the beaten-down stocks.】

item.title: 贵金属、原油价格下跌，因全球紧张局势缓解；铜价走低
item.description: 周四，从白银、黄金到原油、铜等大宗商品价格纷纷下跌。此前中美两国领导人通电话后全球紧张局势有所缓解，美国本周还将与伊朗举行会谈。【原文：Prices of commodities, from silver and gold to crude oil and copper, dived on Thursday, as global tensions eased after a telephone call between the leaders of China and the United States, which is also set for talks with Iran this week.】

item.title: 早盘行情：科技股抛售阴影笼罩下，投资者情绪动荡不安
item.description: 欧洲及全球市场今日展望——由邱思妤为您解读：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu:】

item.title: 消息人士称，普拉特发动机供应疑云令空客产量目标承压
item.description: 据行业消息人士透露，由于飞机制造商空客仍未与发动机制造商普惠公司达成供应协议，其主要飞机生产目标岌岌可危。【原文：Airbus' main aircraft production target hangs in the balance as the planemaker remains without a supply deal with engine maker Pratt & Whitney , industry sources said.】

item.title: 独家：比亚迪巴西工厂转向本土化零部件供应，力争市场领先地位
item.description: 中国汽车制造商比亚迪计划到2026年底，在巴西新工厂实现50%的汽车零部件本土化生产和采购。该公司巴西首席执行官向路透社透露了这一目标，此前市场担忧这家电动汽车巨头可能冲击当地产业。【原文：Chinese automaker BYD is aiming to produce and source 50% of its vehicle components locally at its new Brazilian factory by the end of 2026, the company’s top executive in the country told Reuters, amid concerns about the EV giant undercutting the local industry.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称新日铁正考虑发行32亿美元可转换债券
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，日本新日铁正考虑发行高达5000亿日元（约合32亿美元）的可转换债券，这将是日本史上规模最大的此类债券交易。【原文：Japan's Nippon Steel is considering selling as much as 500 billion yen ($3.2 billion) of convertible bonds, according to two sources with knowledge of the matter, in a transaction that would be the largest of its kind in Japan.】

item.title: 丰田汽车预计将连续第三个季度出现利润下滑，成本和关税压力持续发酵
item.description: 丰田汽车公司预计将于周五公布季度营业利润连续第三次下滑，尽管全球汽车销量创下纪录且混合动力车需求强劲，但成本上升和美国进口关税仍对盈利构成压力。【原文：Toyota Motor is expected to report a third straight decline in quarterly operating profit on Friday, as rising costs and U.S. import tariffs weigh on earnings despite record global vehicle sales and strong demand for hybrids.】

item.title: 知情人士称，力拓预计将争取更多时间审议与嘉能可的交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，力拓集团与嘉能可公司预计将在周四英国监管机构设定的最后期限前宣布延长合并谈判，以便力拓有更多时间评估交易的可行性。【原文：Rio Tinto and Glencore are expected to announce an extension to merger talks ahead of a UK regulatory deadline on Thursday, to allow Rio more time to study the merits of any deal, three people familiar with the talks said.】

item.title: 日经亚洲报道称，惠普、戴尔、宏碁和华硕正考虑在内存芯片供应短缺之际使用中国芯片。
item.description: 日经亚洲周四报道称，在全球供应短缺威胁产品发布并推高科技行业成本之际，惠普、戴尔、宏碁和华硕等个人电脑制造商正考虑首次从中国芯片制造商采购内存芯片。【原文：PC makers HP , Dell , Acer and Asus are considering sourcing memory chips from Chinese chipmakers for the first time amid a global supply crunch that is threatening product launches and pushing up costs across the tech industry, Nikkei Asia reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 谷歌凭借卓越的人工智能增长势头，从落后者跃居领先者，超越OpenAI。
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet正以势不可挡之势挑战OpenAI，这印证了华尔街对其作为人工智能领军者的认知。这一局面与一年前截然不同——当时投资者认为该公司远远落后于竞争对手，并对其股价予以重创。【原文：Alphabet is taking on OpenAI with a gusto that underscores Wall Street's perception that the Google parent is the leader in AI, a turn of events from a year ago when investors thought it was badly lagging behind rivals and punished its stock.】

item.title: 工会称，大众汽车田纳西州工厂的工人已就初步协议达成一致
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会周三晚间表示，大众汽车位于田纳西州查塔努加市的工厂工人已与公司达成一项初步协议。【原文：Workers at Volkswagen's plant in Chattanooga, Tennessee have won a tentative agreement with the company, the United Auto Workers union said late Wednesday.】

item.title: 索尼季度业绩强劲后上调盈利目标，但PlayStation 5销量下滑
item.description: 日本索尼公司周四公布的财报显示，其第三季度营业利润增长22%，远超市场预期，并上调了全年业绩展望。不过，其PlayStation 5游戏主机销量出现下滑。【原文：Japan's Sony on Thursday reported a 22% rise in third-quarter operating profit that trounced forecasts and lifted its full-year outlook, although sales of its PlayStation 5 console slid.】

item.title: 高通、Arm因智能手机芯片销量不佳，成为内存短缺的最大受害者
item.description: 内存短缺将持续抑制手机销量，对高通等芯片供应商和Arm Holdings等芯片架构设计公司造成需求冲击。周三两家公司公布的财报均令投资者失望，高管和分析师均如此表示。【原文：Memory shortages will constrain sales of cell phones for some time, hurting demand for chip industry companies like supplier Qualcomm and chip architecture designer Arm Holdings , executives and analysts said on Wednesday as both companies reported results that disappointed investors.】

item.title: 亚洲股市走低，全球科技股抛售令投资者惊慌
item.description: 亚洲股市走软，因科技板块持续受人工智能投资成本激增的担忧拖累，不过随着芯片供应商股价上涨，华尔街期货正试图反弹。【原文：Asian stocks faltered as concerns about the exploding costs of AI investment hounded the tech sector, though Wall Street futures were trying to make a comeback as chip providers gained.】

item.title: Instagram短暂停机后恢复运行，此前故障曾影响美国用户
item.description: 据故障监测网站Downdetector.com数据显示，Meta旗下Instagram平台于周三在美国遭遇短暂停机，影响逾万名用户后已恢复正常。 截至美东时间晚8点30分，该平台共收到10,108起故障报告。Downdetector通过整合多渠道状态报告来追踪服务中断情况。【原文：Meta Platforms' Instagram rebounded after a brief outage affected more than 10,000 users in the U.S. on Wednesday, according to outage-tracking website Downdetector.com. There were 10,108 incidents of people reporting issues with the social media platform, as of 8.30 p.m. ET, according to Downdetector, which tracks outages by collating status reports from a number of sources.】

item.title: 保罗·韦斯律师事务所主席布拉德·卡普在爱泼斯坦邮件曝光后辞职
item.description: 华尔街知名律所保瑞律师事务所周三宣布，布拉德·卡普已辞去公司董事长职务，并任命斯科特·巴舍伊接任该职位。【原文：Prominent Wall Street law firm Paul Weiss said on Wednesday that Brad Karp had resigned as chairman of the firm and it had appointed Scott Barshay to be his successor.】

item.title: 美元回升，央行决议临近
item.description: 周四亚洲交易时段初，美元汇率持稳。欧洲央行与英国央行即将公布利率决议，市场普遍预期这两家央行将在全球交易日稍晚时段维持利率不变。【原文：The dollar steadied at the start of Asian trade on Thursday ahead of interest rate decisions from the European Central Bank and the Bank of England, both of which are expected to keep rates on hold later in the global day.】

item.title: 美联储官员库克称政策利率"极其温和"地限制性
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会理事丽莎·库克周三表示，她认为当前政策利率仅具有温和限制性，并暗示支持在进一步降息前保持观望。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook on Wednesday said she feels the policy interest rate now is only mildly restrictive, and signaled she supports taking time before reducing interest rates further.】
